TopicTitle: can i remove the MK 1 command capsule

Articles.Content: is there a way to remove the MK 1 command capsule from the build so i can make a pure satelite launche rocket?

sorry to inform but there is no way to remove it because thats were ur litte kerbalnaughts pilot the ship without it no1 would be piloting the ship and just imagine wat would hapenn with an unpiloted ship.
More than likely, it'd explode just as violently. There'd probably be fewer green chunks around the launchpad, though.
